title: Rvce cs with data science VS PES cse

comments.body: Usually cse + spec < cse core , but rv is the top uni after all and better management than pes. Your choice to make:p
ALSO rv crowd is less , pes has a huge crowd , so better chances at placement
Avoid specialisation but if no plans for masters and all go for rvce else pes is the way only big negative for pesu is quiet crowded
